item.title: Raspberry Pi
item.author: cyrusncy@gmail.com (CyrusN)
item.description: Setting Setup for a new Pi 3 model B Setting for OTG mode Add ssh public key Recommanded software packages Installation Configuration of zsh Install oh-my-zsh and my custom theme Config .zshrc Autostart Pin Examples Links Some Projects Some thoughts Setting brightness of Touch led Sensors Others Using Raspberry Pi to control servo Sensor HAT ADC (Analog to Digital Convertor) Setting Raspberry Pi Documentation VNC (Virtual Network Computing) - Raspberry Pi Documentation SSH (Secure Shell) - Raspberry Pi Documentation Passwordless SSH access - Raspberry Pi Documentation Ethernet Gadget | Turning your Raspberry PI Zero into a USB Gadget | Adafruit Learning System Setup for a new Pi 3 model B First, you have to follow the installation guide written by raspberrypi.
